title: AWS Certified Developer Associate
subtitle: Master AWS services and pass the DVA-C02 certification exam with Alex's PetTracker journey
description: Comprehensive preparation for the AWS Certified Developer Associate (DVA-C02) exam. Follow Alex, a developer building PetTracker - a pet health and tracking startup - as you learn to develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS services. This course covers all exam domains including development with AWS services, security, deployment, troubleshooting, and optimization. Each chapter follows Alex solving real-world problems, making concepts stick through storytelling. Includes hands-on labs, practice questions, and exam strategies.
author: Cloud Academy
author_bio: Our instructors are AWS certified professionals with years of experience building production systems on AWS. They've helped thousands of developers pass their AWS certifications.
